name: Canoeing
overview: By the makers of Power Boat Race, this game by Red Arrow software was released in 1990, it was also later re-reeleased under the title Canoeing. Press up to set your canoe to "forward" and down for "reverse". Hold down fire to accelerate. Left and right turns canoe clockwise/counter-clockwise. Try to get the best time on the course and keep your boat off the rocks.
